name: Harish Chaandar Ravichandar
content: Harish Ravichandar | College of Computing Skip to main navigation Skip to main content Harish Ravichandar Assistant Professor harish.ravichandar@gatech.edu https://harishravichandar.com/ Research Areas: 				Robot Learning; Human-Centered Robotics; Multi-Agent Systems Biography Harish is an Assistant Professor in the School of Interactive Computing at Georgia Institute of Technology. He is also a core faculty member of Georgia Techâ€™s Institute for Robotics and Intelligent Machines (IRIM). His research interests span the areas of robot learning, human-robot interaction, and multi-agent systems. He directs the Structured Techniques for Algorithmic Robotics (STAR) Lab, where he and his team works on structured algorithms that help robots reliably operate and collaborate in unstructured environments alongside humans. Affiliations School of Interactive Computing Machine Learning (ML@GT)
